Enchantment 3

Astral Shield

S1
spell id [id]: 892
effect number [effect_number]: 23
damage [damage]: 268435456
spec [spec]: 8404992

area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 20-
Bless/Buff: Astral Shield
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], May Use Underwater [uwok])
A shield of Astral energies forms around the mage. Anyone trying to strike through the shield will have their mind blasted unconscious by the force of the shield. Magic resistance may negate the effect of the shield and allow enemies to strike the mage. The power of the Astral Shield is greater for mages who are highly skilled in Astral magic.
Paralysis strength: 12 + astral mage level (reduced by weapon length, magic resistance negates)
